metadata.Title: CVE-2022-29977 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description: There is an assertion failure error in stbi__jpeg_huff_decode,stb_image.h:1894 in libsixel img2sixel 1.8.6. Remote attackers couldleverage this vulnerability to cause a denial-of-service via a crafted JPEGfile.

criterions.comment: libsixel: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
